statements: DELETE FROM MarineBiodiversityHotspots WHERE location = 'Pacific Ocean';
DELETE FROM conservation_efforts WHERE conservation_status = 'In Progress';
DELETE FROM conservation_efforts WHERE conservation_organization='World Wildlife Fund';
DELETE FROM MarineSpecies WHERE habitat_type = 'Coral Reef';
DELETE FROM Species WHERE habitat = 'Forest' AND endangered = TRUE;
DELETE FROM Observations WHERE hotspot_id = 5 AND species_id = 10;
DELETE FROM Conservation_Efforts WHERE conservation_type = 'Protected Area';
DELETE FROM Conservation_Efforts WHERE effort_name = 'Marine Protected Area';
